mapper.select: SELECT bnum, fnum, foption, fprice, fimg, finfo, fname FROM menu
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (bnum, fname, fprice, finfo, fimg, fnum, foption) VALUES (#{bnum}, #{fname}, #{fprice}, #{finfo}, #{fimg},(SELECT COALESCE(MAX(m.fnum), 0) + 1 FROM menu m), #{foption})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET fname = #{fname}, finfo = #{finfo}, fprice = #{fprice}, foption = #{foption}, fimg = #{fimg} WHERE fnum = #{fnum}
